cards.html:
Hello everyone, we have some big exciting news: we now have a podcast! In it, we talk about all things Nintendo and Nintendo Switch, including news, our opinions, our likes and dislikes and much more. We currently have them up on YouTube and SoundCloud, but we are working on getting it up on many other platforms, so stay tuned for that!

To listen, we’ve got the YouTube and Soundcloud links below…

 

Click here for Soundcloud link!

 

We plan on uploading new episodes every fortnight on the Friday, so stay tuned!

If you’d like to ask us any questions for us to answer in the podcast, please don’t hesitate to contact us on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube… anywhere, really. We love hearing from you guys.

Have a great day and happy listening ðŸ™‚
